text: Munah Evangeline Pelham-Youngblood (22 September 19838 July 2020) was a Liberian politician. She was elected twice to the Liberian House of Representatives. She was the youngest person ever elected to the Liberian parliament.IPFF. Youth Must Participate in the Accountability Processes for Improved Development â€“ Hon. Munah E. Pelham-Youngblood She was a member of Congress for Democratic Change. She worked for President George Weah. Pelham- Youngblood died in Accra, Ghana, on 8 July 2020 at the age of 36.FrontPage Africa. Liberia: 'A Real Tragedy Has Hit the CDC': Rep Munah.Pelham Youngblood is Dead' ==References== Category:1983 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Liberian politicians
title: Munah Pelham-Youngblood
